name: Deflection Dimension
description: Follow Tim on this wonderfully unique dungeon crawler adventure through the Deflection Dimension! Encountering enemies, puzzles, traps and more enemies as you traverse the different worlds, but here’s the catch, you have to do all of this without any weapons!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel i3-3220 or Higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2500 or Higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
